website_summaries.verdict: The Keds Carmel has feminine tailoring that offers its wearers a stylish yet relaxing sneaker. With its slip-on form, it is one of the women’s on-the-go footwear. May it be for a casual day walk, overtime duty in the office, or late-night date, this pair appeals not only in the eyes of the people but also on its functionality.
pros: A lot of wearers praise the Keds Carmel due to the comfort it provides, even if one wears it throughout the day
Dressing the sneaker up and down is effortless due to its attractive silhouette, according to many reviewers
While wearing this slip-on, plenty of the purchasers receive flattering remarks
Some express their joy with the ease of maintaining the Carmel sneaker from Keds
Several buyers agree that it has decent arch support
For many, the Carmel Twill is the go-to footwear for any occasion because of its versatility
A handful of end-users enjoy the cushy cushioning of the sneaker’s memory foam insole
cons: Some end up having blisters because the construction rubs and irritates the feet
The pair generally have an excellent set of colorways, which makes it easy to style
however, one wishes to make it available in more colors

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute shoe and I was so disappointed I had to return them. The stitching on both shoes hits right on my bunions and it was immediately painful. Other than that I would say they fit as expected. It that ribbon was just another inch away they would have been perfect
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bates

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looked comfortable, but as a couple previous reviews mentioned, their construction rubs and irritates in all the wrong places.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D

customer_reviews.title: Cute but inside stitching rubs and causes pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing a similar styled Ked for the last few years and LOVED them. These unfortunately aren’t really the same. :-/ the stitching inside kinda rubs right around the baby toe and isn’t very comfortable. They are also a bit tighter, and I am not sure if it is because the material is different. My last ones were canvas and these seem to be a smoother material with an elastic stretch, so they are tighter all around. They are cute and cute on, but unfortunately, not comfortable, and I don’t think I will be purchasing another pair when these wear out unless they start to stretch out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These don't break in, but they'll make your heels bleed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to replace another very similar pair of slip-on Keds, expecting the overall build of the shoe to be the same. Unfortunately, these have a very poorly sewn and thick posterior seam. Normally, I can wear bandaids to prevent cuts from new shoes a couple of times and then they're broken in. Not these. The seams sliced through bandaids and heel tape and still cut my heel up. This bloody mess was the worst in the first wear but still happened each wear thereafter. They never broke in so I've had to quit wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L

customer_reviews.title: Super cute sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these sneakers look. The are a little tight on my feet. I wish they came in wide and not just medium width. I am trying to stretch them across the silky ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, but not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is cute, looks nice on my feet, and has a comfortable footbed. I wish I could keep them. As I walked across my apartment, my heel kept coming out of the back. If I went down half a size, these shoes would be too tight, as the toebox is narrow. I'm disappointed I'll have to send them back. I thought they'd be a great summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 7 shoe but these are a size 7.5. So if you want to get shoe that actually fits from this brand, you would have to go a size lower.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a shoe that is comfortable and that I can wear while traveling instead of tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Martha

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe! I have hard time buying shoes. I have a high instep and narrow hill. I cannot wear a shoe that it tight on top of which the shoes are perfect. The last pair of Keds that were slip on and fit me perfectly. But because the heal sliding up and down I had send back. I resorted to buying new ones of a different brand at a shoe store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many sneakers by KEDS so was surprised at how these gapped near the arch of the foot when walking. i wear a size 9 in all my other KEDS, but, these are sloppy on my feet. its time to look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Catz

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size and very stiff
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff shoe. Not true to size. Disappointed. Also, did not arrive when promised so it sat on porch in rain. Amazon actually issued a refund because it was “lost”. A neighbor picked it up without my knowledge. When I arrived home a week later, it was most difficult to return because I was already refunded the cost.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute style but so uncomfortable. They hurt my feet after 10 minutes wearing them. Especially the back of the shoes is so rigid and thick that I get a blister every time.
customer_reviews.author: Cris-tall

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The top and edge of the shoe was sticking into my foot even though the heel was too big. It was uncomfortable and I returned it. They are cute, but I need comfort too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Haley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes and very comfortable. I already had these in grey and had to buy these in black as well and would love to buy the newer grey ones as soon as I can. They are a little pricey but not too bad. Overall, I love these shoes and think they are so cute and comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real cute
customer_reviews.text: So,cute..they look great with capris and leggings. The back of the right shoe rubbed a blister on my heel but other than that, they are comfortable and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Classic Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of comfortable white shoes the I could walk in all day. These shoes are perfect. They fit well, they're comfortable and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit good like ones I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this style shoe for years. I have several pairs. These shoes slipped on my heel and I washed them. They still slipped and do not fit like the ones that are exactly the same I have bought in the past. I do not understand.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Haggard

customer_reviews.title: definitely go 1/2 smaller
customer_reviews.text: I am originally a 6.5 women's, and I ended up returning to get a small size. it's very cute and could wear everyday for anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: aya

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these shoes and swear by the brand. The only thing is they gave me blisters which makes it hard to actually wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Habermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size but could not get the shoe on my foot. They were adorable, but make sure you order up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Matuszak Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were a cute shoe however there wasn't support enough for my arch. Not sure if changing the size would of helped or not.
customer_reviews.author: ND customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy shoes. You will need to break them in, at first they were tight over my pinky toes but now fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keds makes great products
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds shoes, for some reason the right shoe was to tight on my instep (top of my foot). I had to stretch the shoe for about a week before I could wear it. I don’t think it’s the shoe that is bad, it’s my right foot with the style.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Fenn

customer_reviews.title: Keds
customer_reviews.text: Keds dont fit me very well. I usuly put a foam sole in them & they fit better. A 6.5 feels more like a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a narrow shoe. These are right there, but I ordered too large. A 1/2 size less would have been perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: Slips off feet even with smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a Half size down since their slip on’s and they still would slip off my feet when I walk so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for tech/active office job
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite shoe to wear while on the go. When it’s business casual and I don’t have to wear heels to work my tech job, these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D'Orsi

customer_reviews.title: Keds
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great but the band that is stitched around the edge is a little too tight to be comfortable and the heel is a little larger than a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Vande Zande

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes but run big
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes and I love them but they are too big. I wear a 10 but these fit like a 10.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Sensiba

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite slip-ons
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore these I ended up with blisters on the heel from the back rubbing; but that was easily fixed with some silicone pads in the heel area. Now that I have the heel area taken care of they are my go to slip-ons and they are really comfortable. I like that they can be worn with just about entitling. As a side note they are fairly narrow and most likely will not fit someone with a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite comfy Keds.
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds. These shoes look good but are very stiff and hurt my feet. I will be giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: when I returned this I had to pay extra bc code would not show up. The other return did. I had to pay $6
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size I usually wear in Keds but this was too large while another Keds item I ordered in the same size was fine. I was disappointed. Since I wore them I cannot return them so I am trying to make them work with inserts. Still loose.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda C.

customer_reviews.title: stretches out a whole size
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these keds in different colors. I have ordered the before all in the same size. I liked this pair because the black was truly a dark black. But ! wore them less than one day and they stretched out so badly that I cannot wear them any more not even with socks! None of the others have done this. Return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A longer size 7
customer_reviews.text: A very cute, very comfortable shoe but about a half size too long. They’re wearable though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality of the shoe. The insole is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fun In The Sun Lady

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large I should have ordered a half size smaller. Very nice casual flats.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Benton

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes but too small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great but too narrow for my narrow feet :(
customer_reviews.author: Candy Powers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed as it is so big it slips on my foot and caused blisters
customer_reviews.text: I bought another style of Keds, and I wore Keds previously. The other style fit okay, but this is the same size and is definitely bigger.
customer_reviews.author: B Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Everyday. Little big but 6 1/2 would be to small.
customer_reviews.author: James Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pair have returned 2 so far, first and second were too small and painful to wear, third is tbd.
customer_reviews.author: NHOW

customer_reviews.title: Get back heel inserts.
customer_reviews.text: All my kids require a slip guard insert at the heel to prevent rubbing sores. This shoe was no different. Once inserted the shoe is great! Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe, But Not True to Size
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and feel of the shoe, but order a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would like to exchange it for a smaller size but don't know how
customer_reviews.author: beverly bohach

customer_reviews.title: Most UNCOMFORTABLE shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the most uncomfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. I’m a true size 11, and they are almost a size too large. I put insoles in to tighten the fit and they still flop off. The insoles add comfort, but they still cause pain after walking a couple minutes. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Was able to retire with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Always get the same size but this particular brand must run large
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Verplank

customer_reviews.title: Comfis
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to maintain. Size fits perfectly to me.
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: Love the style.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were tiny bit wider and the heel wasn’t so hard, takes a while to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Working_mom

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size runs large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size I normally wear in Keds and the shoes would not stay on my feet when I tried to walk in them. When I returned the shoes to the seller, I had to pay the cost of returning the shoes. I would never buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Bide

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes, but...
customer_reviews.text: They run a size too big. I can’t wear them without them slipping up and down
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: Neatly packed
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 8-8.5, ordered 8.5 to be on the safe side but I dont have wide feet and this are somewhat loose. So for next time I will order size 8. Other than that very pretty shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Beyil Rivera

customer_reviews.title: little big
customer_reviews.text: They were to stiff and im a true 9 they slipped off my feet
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Dress it up or down with this comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually 1 of 3 pairs I’ve bought of this style of shoe! Very comfortable and good support!
customer_reviews.author: Angy

customer_reviews.title: Fits but blisters
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, but got blisters on the back of both heels after first wear. Unsure if I’ll wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it a 5 star but hey didn’t fit as expected. Full size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: My foot kept slipping out of the back of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: good looking & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very cute & comfortable but too wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Misiak

customer_reviews.title: Go down 1/2 size!
customer_reviews.text: This is 1/2 size off. I’m a 7.5. And I have other keds that are 7.5. They fit fine. This one is too big!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Ease of ordering and speed of delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8 in all shoes! This pair gapped at the heel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Navy  Kedsq
customer_reviews.text: I wanted navy Keds & I especially like the toe design. They are a little tight, but I haven't worn them much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Molleigh's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe as always with Ked's  !
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds ! This pair is great and is comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, very pretty, but had to return because they were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Carmel Twill Slip On Shoe
product_meta.description: Casual style with a polished twist! Soft cotton twill upper with a round toe. Easy slip-on style. Soft breathable lining. Cushioned and breathable Dream Foam® footbed for added comfort. Flexible rubber outsole. Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Dream Foam Memory: This cushiony footbed features a thick layer of upremely soft memory foam, enhanced with supportive and breathable Dream Foam underneath for ultimate comfort.
